title: Day 3 Prac Q4 and Q5
text:
#sin(x) plot

#|echo: true

x <- (-20:20)/10
y = sin(x)

plot(x, y, col="red", xlab = "x", ylab = "sin(x)", main = "The sin(x) graph with x ranging from -2 to 2")

title: Prac 1
text:
#Finding all rows with missing data

#|echo: true

rows_incomplete <- c()

for (i in 1:nrow(airquality)){
  if (any(is.na(airquality[i,]))){
    rows_incomplete <- c(rows_incomplete,i)}}
    
print(rows_incomplete)

 [1]   5   6  10  11  25  26  27  32  33  34  35  36  37  39  42  43  45  46  52
[20]  53  54  55  56  57  58  59  60  61  65  72  75  83  84  96  97  98 102 103
[39] 107 115 119 150


#Calculate mean, sd, min, max for temperature and ozone level

#|echo: true

##Temperature statistics
(mean_temp = mean(airquality$Temp, na.rm = TRUE ))

[1] 77.88235

(sd_temp = sd(airquality$Temp, na.rm = TRUE))

[1] 9.46527

(min_temp = min(airquality$Temp, na.rm = TRUE))

[1] 56

(max_temp = max(airquality$Temp, na.rm = TRUE))

[1] 97

##Ozone statistics
(mean_temp = mean(airquality$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE ))

[1] 42.12931

(sd_temp = sd(airquality$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE))

[1] 32.98788

(min_temp = min(airquality$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE))

[1] 1

(max_temp = max(airquality$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE))

[1] 168


#Fitting a linear regression to the cars dataset

#|echo: true
lm(cars$speed ~ cars$dist)


Call:
lm(formula = cars$speed ~ cars$dist)

Coefficients:
(Intercept)    cars$dist  
     8.2839       0.1656
